memberdef.name: ALL_SERVICE_FLAGS
memberdef.initializer: { NODE_NONE, NODE_NETWORK, NODE_BLOOM, NODE_WITNESS, NODE_COMPACT_FILTERS, NODE_NETWORK_LIMITED, NODE_P2P_V2, }

memberdef.name: ALL_NET_PERMISSION_FLAGS
memberdef.initializer: { NetPermissionFlags::None, NetPermissionFlags::BloomFilter, NetPermissionFlags::Relay, NetPermissionFlags::ForceRelay, NetPermissionFlags::NoBan, NetPermissionFlags::Mempool, NetPermissionFlags::Addr, NetPermissionFlags::Download, NetPermissionFlags::Implicit, NetPermissionFlags::All, }

memberdef.name: ALL_CONNECTION_TYPES
memberdef.initializer: { ConnectionType::INBOUND, ConnectionType::OUTBOUND_FULL_RELAY, ConnectionType::MANUAL, ConnectionType::FEELER, ConnectionType::BLOCK_RELAY, ConnectionType::ADDR_FETCH, }

memberdef.name: ALL_NETWORKS
memberdef.initializer: = std::array{ Network::NET_UNROUTABLE, Network::NET_IPV4, Network::NET_IPV6, Network::NET_ONION, Network::NET_I2P, Network::NET_CJDNS, Network::NET_INTERNAL, }
